overview:
Frank Jones is the CTO and co-founder of Lettuce, where he leads the development team in creating the best technology around. He has been instrumental in Lettuce’s product and growth since starting the company with co-founder Raad Mobrem. Frank’s work ethic is beyond amazing as he has been known for pulling 100+ hour work weeks.

Frank studied Computer Science at the University of California at Santa Barbara.

Frank enjoys working out and listening to “Call Me Maybe” on a regular basis. Don’t ask us why.
